component.name: sadd
component.description: add one or more members to a set

component.name: sDiffStore
component.description: subtract multiple sets and store the resulting set in a key

component.name: sInterStore
component.description: intersect multiple sets and store the resulting set in a key

component.name: sIsMember
component.description: determine if a given value is a member of a set

component.name: sMembers
component.description: get the all members in a set

component.name: sMove
component.description: move a member from one set to another

component.name: sPop
component.description: remove and return one or multiple random members from a set

component.name: sRandMember
component.description: get one or multiple random members from a set

component.name: sRem
component.description: remove one or more members from a set

component.name: sUnionStore
component.description: add multiple sets and store the resulting set in a key
